# pronunciationHint

**Instance Property**

A hint that describes how to pronounce the custom intent object.

## Declaration

```swift
var pronunciationHint: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property provides a soundalike equivalent of the object’s [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INObject/displayString] to Siri, rather than a phonetic spelling. For example, the phrase “iTunes” might have “eye toons” as its pronunciation string.

## Describing the Object for the System

- **identifier**: A string that identifies the custom intent object within your app.
- **alternativeSpeakableMatches**: An array of alternative speakable strings that identify the object.
